group_1.textRight: The Beachside Perfect Pair Contest...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I want one of the prizes that comes@with winning first place.

group_1.textRight: ...What is it, then? It's not some weird@ingredient, right?

group_1.textLeft: No, not that. What I want...
...is two tickets for the special@Candy World event!
I'd like to win the contest without Mii finding@out so I can surprise her with them.

group_1.textRight: Ah, it's for your sister, then.

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps you were expecting me to make@you a home-cooked meal?
I'm sorry...but not this time.

group_1.textRight: I don't want you cookin' for me this time -@or any other time, for that matter.
Anyway, as I was tryin' to say...
I knew you doted on Mikage big time,
but now I realize just how far you're@willing to go for her.

group_1.textLeft: Of course I would. She's my little sister,@after all.
And that's why...
...I want to get a gift for my dear little Mii.
The contest is about the perfect "pair," however,@so two people need to enter together.

group_1.textRight: ...Oh yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Except I don't have a partner...

group_1.textRight: Kanagi can't do it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid she has plans.
But you know, while the main prize for first@place is an all-you-can-eat scallop barbeque,
it comes with two bonus prizes@as well: the tickets,
and a giant Mocha Bunny doll,@as I recall.
Aren't Rena and Kaede quite fond of@that character?

group_1.textRight: Well, yeah, but...?

group_1.textLeft: *Pointed stare*

group_1.textRight: ...Are ya tryin' to ask me to join you?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: Well, it's not that I can't, it's just...
You see, normally,
you'd go up to every Magical Girl you know and@wheedle 'em all into doin' the contest for you, right?
Like some kinda "overwhelm the competition@with sheer numbers" strategy or something.

group_1.textLeft: What?! Is that who you take me for?
Momoko? Why are you looking away?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm just surprised you didn't get any of@the other girls with the Union to do this.

group_1.textLeft: ...I had considered it.
But I've told Mii to keep her distance from@the Union.
I can't make everyone there do my bidding for@the sake of someone who isn't involved.

group_1.textRight: ...You really want me to partner up@with you?

group_1.textLeft: ...Can't you?

group_1.textRight: Alright. I'll enter the contest with you.
I wanna give Rena and Kaede that giant@stuffed bunny.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! Atta girl, Momoko! I love you so much!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah, cut it out.

group_1.textLeft: With that being settled, we'd best move@quickly... Let's go shopping right now!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What? Now?!
Jeez... You're as carefree as ever.
